definitions.definition: Unable or indisposed to tolerate , endure or bear .
examples: I am lactose- intolerant , so I can't drink milk.

definitions.definition: Not tolerant ; close-minded about new or different ideas ; indisposed to tolerate contrary opinions or beliefs ; impatient of dissent or opposition ; denying or refusing the right of private opinion or choice in others; inclined to persecute or suppress dissent.

main_definition: Unable or indisposed to tolerate , endure or bear .
secondary_definitions: Not tolerant ; close-minded about new or different ideas ; indisposed to tolerate contrary opinions or beliefs ; impatient of dissent or opposition ; denying or refusing the right of private opinion or choice in others; inclined to persecute or suppress dissent.
